item.title: Vagrant
item.author: Author
item.description: Box Download Box It is possible to download from the Vagrant Cloud some images pre-created by users and the hashicorp. From shell just type: 1 vagrant box add hashicorp/precise64 This will download (if not already present in the image list) the box precise64 ie an Ubuntu 12.04 64 bit system. Box List To view the list of all the boxes present (downloaded), just type: 1 vagrant box list Delete Box To delete a Box from a shell just type:
